name: psycho-boost
effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Allows a full-power attack,
but sharply lowers SP. ATK.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Allows a full-power attack,
but sharply lowers SP. ATK.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
An intense attack
that also sharply
reduces the user’s
SP. ATK stat.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user attacks the
foe at full power.
The attack’s recoil
sharply reduces the
user’s Sp. Atk stat.
